price: ߝߋߙߊߥߎ߲߫ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߢߓߊ ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߐߐ߰ ߸ ߣߌ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߎߓߊ߯ ߞߎߛߊ߲ߓߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla al-mala-u min qawmi fir'ʿawna inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
